data.title: Masood Ahmad - Infosec Executive - Director I.t at Crescent Regional Hospital
data.meta_description: Masood Ahmad has a diverse work experience spanning over 17 years.
data.text:
Masood Ahmad has a diverse work experience spanning over 17 years. Masood began their career as a Research Associate at COMSATS University Islamabad, where they worked on various projects related to student information systems and conducted research in scientific and cultural fields. Masood then moved on to work as an IT Operations Lead at Standard Chartered Bank, where they focused on OLTP operations for the banking sector. Masood also worked as a Software Engineer and Database Administrator at Air University, where they handled end-to-end installation, configuration, and support of Oracle software and database instances. Masood later worked as a Database Analyst at ASP Cares, assisting in the acquisition of Crescent Group and managing data manipulation and extraction. Masood then joined Crescent Group as an InfoSec Executive - Director I.T., where they oversaw IT operations, implemented security strategies, and expanded operations during acquisitions and the establishment of new clinics. Most recently, Masood served as a Technology Consultant - IS - IOT at SIGMABATS, where they maintained data integrity across multiple databases and designed research plans for data gathering and analysis. Overall, Masood's work experience demonstrates their expertise in technology consulting, database management, IT operations, and research analysis.

Masood Ahmad completed their Executive MBA in Business Administration, Management and Operations from the Quantic School of Business and Technology in 2021. Prior to that, they earned a degree in Software Engineering from COMSATS University Islamabad, where they also obtained a Master's of Software Engineering and a Post Graduate Diploma in Database Management Systems. Masood also holds a PGD-IT in Database Management Systems from Bloomsburg Institute of Information Technology and a Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com.) degree in Accounting and Business/Management from the University of the Punjab. Additionally, Masood Ahmad has obtained various certifications, including the Google Cybersecurity Certificate, Oracle Certified Expert 11g R2, and Oracle Database 11g Administrator Certified Professional.
